Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: The development of Waltix.platform has started.  From the specifications to the platform! The project Waltix.io has completed the design phase and has started developing software. Programmers of the company create the foundation of an innovative system for the growing ticket market.  Waltix.platform will provide an opportunity for software developers to make full use of innovative technologies adapted specifically for the ticket market.  For the interaction of services and programs with the Waltix.platform a special interface (API) that allows issuing «smart tickets» and fully controlling their life cycle has been developed.  "Smart tickets" differ from the ordinary ones in that they contain the rules of circulation, including in the secondary market. This means that the event organizer has the right to set the ceiling price, his commission from resale, gift rules and so on.  All the movements of "smart tickets" from issue to redemption are safe – they are fixed in the distributed operations registry (blockchain), which is reliably protected from hacking and duplicated on several computers.  Waltix.platform is ahead of time, providing access to the future of the ticket market, where all the operations are predictable and safe, where there is no place for fraud and speculation.  We invite everyone to register on the Waltix.io website to be the first to receive news about the project, to participate in the development and testing of the Waltix.platform, Waltix API and services based on them.

Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: Functionality Waltix!  Fraud and speculation in the ticket market is a problem rooted in ancient Rome. Speculators selling tickets for symbolic events with a ten-fold mark-up. Scammers selling one ticket to several people. Even in our time there are bots buying up electronic tickets at the first second of sales and fake sites for selling fake tickets. It would seem that the problem of betrayal of trust in the online ticket market has no solution. But today there is a technology that makes all transactions fair, understandable and equitable for all interested people. In the growing online ticket market, Waltix presents a solution ahead of time. Details can be found in a short video.

Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: Going to PreSale with a prototype!  Waltix.io team has started implementation of a blockchain ticket platform. Developers have to create and adjust the interaction of a large number of software modules. In this regard, the ICO date will be announced as soon as the version is ready for closed testing.  The cost of the token has also been changed. Now 1WLTX = $ 0.01. The number of tokens will be 1 673 750 000, and the size of the bonus at the initial stage of financing will be equal to 35%.  "Plan changes are related to the decision to release a working version of the platform and its applications before launching the ICO", - said Sergey Kretsu, the operating director of Waltix.io. - "We would like to give investors and partners an opportunity to see the solution before investing in its further development and promotion. Also, we are waiting for changes in the legislation of the Russian Federation which will fix the status of companies working in the field of blockchain and crypto-currency, it will increase the level of confidence in the industry".  The Waltix Team

Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: Beware of scammers!     Attackers send out emails that are not related to the Waltix project in any way on behalf of waltix.io. Last weekend, several of our subscribers received a letter imitating the corporate style of the Waltix mailing list. Users were asked to download an executable file located on a third-party server.    Unfortunately, no major company is immune from such actions. To fake a corporate identity and return address when sending a letter is not difficult. We are investigating the incident, but it is already clear that this was a pathetic attempt to deceive our subscribers' vigilance and force them to download an external virus program.    Our servers were not hacked, accounts are not compromised, and if you did not install third-party software, then no action is required.    Nevertheless let us take this opportunity to remind you that we do not send executable modules and archived files, we do not place links to programs in the letter. After receiving a suspicious email, do not open attachments and do not download files from extraneous websites. The programs available for testing will be placed in your personal account on the official website. Also we never ask for your logins and passwords. Do not share them with anyone. Thus, if the letter contains a request for login credentials, it is likely to be scammers. If the letter contains an attachment in the form of a file or archive, it is scammers. If the link leads to an extraneous site, it is scammers.  Please inform us of any fraudulent attempts to forge our letters.  Glad to have you with us! Be carefull!  Waltix team

Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: Vladimir Putin instructed the government and the Central Bank to develop laws to regulate the market of cryptocurrencies. Amendments to the legislation should be prepared in stages until July 1, 2018, - the Kremlin website reports. For nine months, the Russian Banks, together with the Government of the Russian Federation will determine the rules for cryptocurrencies circulation and initial public offering on the market by analogy with the securities market. At the first stage, the government and the Central Bank will develop proposals to establish a test site on the basis of the Bank of Russia for "approbation of innovative financial technologies, products and services prior to the establishment of the rules for regulating relations related to their use in the financial market" and "for the formation of a single payment space with new financial technologies, including the technology of distributed registries, for the Member States of the Eurasian Economic Union." In parallel, the government and the Central Bank will define the terminology. In the legislation of the Russian Federation such concepts as "technology of distributed registers", "digital letter of credit", "digital mortgage", "cryptocurrency", "token" and "smart contract" will be introduced. As a result, the principles and laws for the regulation and taxation of mining, as well as of a public attraction of funds and cryptocurrencies by placing tokens (ICO) by analogy with the regulation of the primary securities offering will be developed. Experts believe that the initiative of the President will lead to the removal of unscrupulous players from the market. "We believe that it is necessary to develop such methods of the ICO market regulation that will benefit potential investors, - comments the Waltix project manager, Sergey Kretsu, - We expect a decrease in abuses and hope that as a result of the establishment of clear and transparent rules of the game, only those players who are willing and able to comply with these rules will remain in the market."

Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: After adding the word "Blochkchain" to the name of the British company, its shares grew fivefold. For a relatively small On-line Plc, Friday was a historic day in all respects - never before since December 1996, when the company first entered the stock exchange, its shares did not grow at such rates, reports Bloomberg. On the eve of this event, the British investment company On-line Plc announced that it adds the word Blockchain to its name and by Friday afternoon London time trading volumes of On-line Plc amounted to 2.9 million shares. And this is 16 times higher than the same indicators for the whole of this year. At 2 p.m. On-line Plc made another small announcement warning investors that its blockchain products are still at an early stage of development. After that, the stock price went down, but in any case, its growth since the beginning of the day was 238%. Thanks to this, the company's market value was 4.4 million pounds sterling ($ 5.8 million), which became the highest growth since 2005. "The technology of Blockchain and cryptocurrency is a new exciting area, over which we have been working for some time. We believe that it's time to rename the company to reflect this development. In this area there will be future growth in our sector," the Essex company said in a statement. As Bloomberg notes, this is not the first time when company shares grow in value after using the word Blockchain in the company name. So, in early October the company Bioptix Inc from Colorado changed its name to Riot Blockchain Inc, and the price of its shares doubled. This indicates the demand for Blockchain technology, which is used by Waltix.io to develop a distributed ticketing service. The company is not going to change the name yet, because for attracting investments the company has issued its own cryptocurrency named WLTX which is used as an internal unit of the service. The procedure for launching cryptocurrency into circulation is called ICO (Initial Coin Offer). The date of the Waltix.io Pre-ICO will be announced later; at the stage of Pre-ICO the WLTX token can be purchased with a 50% bonus. Join the Waltix project now: t.me/waltix_io_en

Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: Become a Blockchain specialist with Waltix! The mention of a Blockchain technology in the CV raises the level of wages by 25%, and the number of job offers increases at times, according to Vedomosti. Since the beginning of the year employers have placed about 500 vacancies for specialists in Blockchain on the portal HeadHunter. In 2016, there were no such vacancies at all. In the Russian market there are very few specialists with the necessary skills and experience. Large companies, mostly banks, are ready to hire specialists in Blockchain, offering a salary of 400,000 rubles per month, although very few people know what for they pay so much. Previously, up to 90% of the vacancies in Russia related to the Blockchain, were searching for developers, but today up to 40% of the vacancies are addressed to those who promotes the ICO: marketers, SMM managers, PR specialists and copywriters, said the source, Anton Dzyadkovsky, co-founder of the Micromoney International company. You can become such a specialist with https://waltix.io/en/ By joining the referral program, you will get a unique experience with the latest technology and can earn 5% on attracting new customers who get in the project on your referral link. BY THE WAY Recently, the demand has grown not only for specialists in Blockchain. The same thing happened with big data programmers and neural network algorithms. The relevant keywords in the list of competences doubled their salaries.

Author: Waltix_io
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: According to forecasts of analytical agencies in 2017, the global market will reach $ 30 billion and on it there is a place to several services. As for our differences from others, we see them in the following: 1) a transparent economic model with obvious benefits for investors; 2) an understandable and not "stretched" scheme for using the WLTX token inside the system; 3) the obvious validity of the claims of the WLTX token on growth; 4) we create a simple and convenient ticket service that is not burdened with complicating its use functions. In fact, the list can be continued if necessary, but I think, at the moment, this is quite enough.

WLTX - internal payment means of service, which is used in the sale and purchase of tickets. You can read more about Waltix tokens on the 8th page of our WhitePaper.

Author: Enegriy
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: Yes, there are several similar services in this industry, our main advantage is that we provide a simple tool that a consumer of any age can use. A tool that will not be cluttered with unnecessary things. We are glad of any fair competition in the market, our confidence is based on the fact that we have come seriously and for a long time. Our project is detailed economically and technically, we see the final result and we move to it step by step.

Author: kumithar
Title: [ANN][ICO] Waltix (WLTX) – innovative solution for global market of tickets
Body: How much do you plan to collect the minimum to start the project?
